channel.title: Posts on Steven Rockarts
channel.description: Recent content in Posts on Steven Rockarts

item.title: Post
item.description: it('cant read items in the records collection if not logged in', async () =>{ let testEnv = await initializeTestEnvironment({ projectId: PROJECT_ID, firestore: { host: 'localhost', port: 8080, rules: readFileSync("../firestore.rules", "utf8"), }, }); const context = testEnv.unauthenticatedContext(); const firestore = context.firestore(); const records = firestore.collection('/records'); await assertFails(records.get()); }); Content
